reviews.text: we really loved this place, from atmosphere to food, everything was amazing. We took few drinks and tried every possible Pincho and honestly they were all great. If you are in town and nearby definetly pay a visit to this amazing place ‚ù§Ô∏è

Best place! Eating small pintxos was sooo great . Tinto de verano is just 11 euro for a huge jar. ü´ô and pintxos, you order at a bar, and they all are amazing. I highly recommend. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a full replacement for a dinner, unless you manage to eat many of them.

I have to say.. it was in june i went here and i am writing now BUT this place is a gem! I loved everything about it! The food 10/10 (we tasted ALL tapas availible) Service 10/10 everything just perfect.. the girls - staff were the ones that made the experience even better! I totally would go back here when in Valencia and recommend to everyone to go here! (We actually ordered 2 timesü§£ it was thaaat delicious!)
Valencia is also one of the most beautiful tapas places you can go. The employees are very kind and friendly. You should definitely try it.
We had here the best bite in the whole Valencia!! This place is so charming, tapas are delicious, especially the one with goat cheese! But you can‚Äôt go wrong with anything else! Love this bar‚Ä¶
